alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northeastern Madison and southwestern Franklin Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Market, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hytop, Estillfork, Francisco, Princeton and Larkin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
